name: Edward Elson
body:
#ABOUT ME
![Profpic](https://fbcdn-profile-a.akamaihd.net/hprofile-ak-xfp1/v/t1.0-1/p160x160/11863304_10204933258318852_2380549854048636443_n.jpg?oh=d12af4bc6ab425920dd78e917980c4d0&oe=569F52ED&__gda__=1453311610_b66fc4f6b0e15cd9d1561682df41b824)  
  
Engineer. Traveler. Reader. Amateur Guitarist and Drummer. Middle-distance Runner.     

[Linkedin](https://sg.linkedin.com/in/edwardelson) | [Flickr](https://www.flickr.com/photos/130479625@N08/) | [Github](https://github.com/edwardelson) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/EdwardElson)  
  
  
#PROJECT LIST  
* [Heart Rate Monitor](http://edwardelson.github.io/Analog-Heart-Rate-Monitor/)  
* [Nanosatellite Attitude Determination System](http://edwardelson.github.io/Attitude_Determination/)  
* [Nanosatellite Pendulum Thrust Stand](http://edwardelson.github.io/Pendulum_Stand/)  
* [Low Altitude Balloon Satellite]  
    
* [Project Make Possible](http://edwardelson.github.io/Project-Make-Possible)

![Singapore](https://c1.staticflickr.com/9/8579/16238215606_895a3744a7_z.jpg)  

>To see the world, things dangerous to come to, to see behind walls, draw closer, to find each other, and to feel. That is the purpose of life.  

_Walter Mitty_
